meanings.definition: A person who coddles or indulges someone excessively.
meanings.sent1: The mollycoddler always spoils his pet with treats and toys.
meanings.sent2: She became known as the family mollycoddler for always pampering her siblings.
meanings.sent3: The mollycoddler made sure the cat had its own pillow and blanket.
meanings.sent4: He was a true mollycoddler, treating his plants like royalty.
meanings.sent5: The mollycoddler's care knew no bounds, even the goldfish had a heater in its bowl.

meanings.definition: To treat someone with excessive indulgence or attention.
meanings.sent1: Parents often mollycoddler their children, afraid to let them fail.
meanings.sent2: She would mollycoddler her best friend whenever she felt sad.
meanings.sent3: The chef would mollycoddler the soufflé, checking on it every minute.
meanings.sent4: He would mollycoddler his car, washing it daily and never letting anyone else drive.
meanings.sent5: The teacher would mollycoddler the students, giving them extra time for every assignment.
